articles.content: A new study of thousands of hospitalized coronavirus patients in the New York City area, the epicenter of the outbreak in the United States, has found that nearly all of them had at least one major chronic health condition, and most 88 percent had at least tw… [+5691 chars]

articles.author: Denise Whitaker
articles.title: New COVID-19 side effect in people under 50 - KATU
articles.description: Doctors in New York say a growing number of their coronavirus patients in their 30s and 40s are suffering sudden strokes. This new side effect comes from the staff at Mt Sinai Health, after seeing blood clot in unusual ways in these younger patients who were …

articles.title: Blood Clots a New Surprise Side Effect in Coronavirus Patients | NBC10 Philadelphia - NBC10 Philadelphia
articles.description: Doctors are noticing a new trend in COVID-19 patients in the form of blood clots. NBC10’s Matt DeLucia spoke with two local doctors about what they’re seeing...

articles.title: Doctors discover new symptom of coronavirus - P.M. News
articles.description: Doctors in the U.S., the world's worst hit country by the coronavirus have found a new symptom for the virus.
articles.content:
A blistered, swollen toe: sign of the coronavirus
Doctors in the U.S., the worlds worst hit country by the coronavirus have found a new symptom for the virus.
The symptom lies in the toes or fingers of the afflicted, especially in white people.
